mapper.select: SELECT s.id, departure_date, arrival_date, ap1.region AS departure_region, ap1.name AS departure_airport, ap2.region AS destination_region, ap2.name AS destination_airport, flight_time, a.name AS airplane_name FROM schedule_tb AS s JOIN route_tb AS r ON s.route_id = r.id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id JOIN airport_tb AS ap1 ON r.departure = ap1.name JOIN airport_tb AS ap2 ON r.destination = ap2.name WHERE departure_date LIKE ''||#{flightDate}||'%' AND r.departure = #{departure} AND r.destination = #{destination}

SELECT s.id, departure_date, arrival_date, flight_time, airplane_id, a.name AS airplane_name, ap1.region AS departure_region, ap1.name AS departure_airport, ap2.region AS destination_region, ap2.name AS destination_airport, type FROM schedule_tb AS s JOIN route_tb AS r ON s.route_id = r.id JOIN airplane_tb AS a ON s.airplane_id = a.id JOIN airport_tb AS ap1 ON r.departure = ap1.name JOIN airport_tb AS ap2 ON r.destination = ap2.name WHERE s.id = #{scheduleId}
